profileAlternative.name: Igor Elbert
profileAlternative.headline: SVP, Data Science at CB Insights
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced head of data science who believes in data-driven decision making. My passion is building efficient teams and transforming companies through effective and innovative use of data.

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced head of data science who believes in data-driven decision making. My passion is building efficient teams and transforming companies through effective and innovative use of data.

given.text: Igor is my mentor during my service at Gilt. You rarely can find such a genius who is both creative and analytical. His passion for innovation and analytics has lead to several big initiatives that completely change how Gilt works. Highly recommend Igor to any organization that needs to instill a solid data-driven culture!

Igor's brilliant analytical skills ensure his MVP status within any software development team. During the time we worked together I admired his deep knowledge of IT architectures and their theoretical foundations. His skill set plus warm personality guarantees any project he is on is a success.

received.text:
I had a pleasure dealing with Joe during his times at DataRobot and RapidMiner. He is very dedicated to assuring successful adoption of a product. Joe pays close attention to clients' requirements and constraints. Looking forward to working with Joe again.
